Summary._: [2], [3], [4] and [5] trains are running with delays in both directions because of a person struck by a train at Atlantic Av-Barclays Ctr.

Description._:
Some southbound [2] and [3] trains end at Chambers St or Wall St.

Some southbound [2] and [3] trains are stopping along the [1] line from Chambers St to South Ferry then end.

Southbound [4] and [5] trains end at Bowling Green or Brooklyn Bridge-City Hall.

These service changes are because of a person struck by a train at Atlantic Av-Barclays Ctr.

LongDescription:
Some southbound [2] and [3] trains end at Chambers St or Wall St. 
Some southbound [2] and [3] trains are stopping along the [1] line from Chambers St to South Ferry then end. 
Southbound [4] and [5] trains end at Bowling Green or Brooklyn Bridge-City Hall. 
These service changes are because of a person struck by a train at Atlantic Av-Barclays Ctr.

Summary._: Some 34 St bound [7] trains are running express from 74 St-Broadway to Queensboro Plaza because of signal problems at 61 St-Woodside.

Description._:
Some 34 St bound [7] trains are running express from 74 St-Broadway to Queensboro Plaza because of signal problems at 61 St-Woodside.

Our crews are on site trying to fix it ASAP and we'll follow up soon. Stay tuned for updates.

Summary._: TRACK & TRACK PLATE INSTALLATION, REPLACEMENT OF POWER & COMMUNICATION CABLES  [2] [3] Trains run at reduced speed through the Clark St Tunnel between Manhattan and Brooklyn

Description._: TRACK & TRACK PLATE INSTALLATION, REPLACEMENT OF POWER & COMMUNICATION CABLES  [2] [3] Trains run at reduced speed through the Clark St Tunnel between Manhattan and Brooklyn

LongDescription: <b><i>TRACK & TRACK PLATE INSTALLATION, REPLACEMENT OF POWER & COMMUNICATION CABLES</i><br clear=left>[2] [3] Trains run at reduced speed through the Clark St Tunnel between Manhattan and Brooklyn</b>All times, Monday to Friday, Dec 4 - 8    Dec 11 - 15  <br><br>The slower speed will keep everyone safe as our crews make critical repairs to the tunnel.<br><br> Please allow additional travel time.<br><b><br>
